item.title: list of html entities
item.description: While creating posts for this bugx , a static site generated with Hugo [ 1 ], the images are created in SVG format using Inkscape, which is not so easy dealing with symbols, e.g greek letters [ 2 ], or other HTML entities [ 3 ]. That is the only reason why this post is created, so the symbols can be copied from this post and then pasted to a text in Inkscape.
